challenges.title: Electronic Life
description: Build a the Project: Electronic Life from Chapter 7 of Eloquent JavaScript. Click here.
Technology Stack: 1. Use only JavaScript (no DOM) and HTML (to host the script) to complete this project, do NOT use any libraries (except the animateworld.js).
The animateworld.js script will create the user interface in the browser (in a later challenge you will create your own interface).
You will need to create a World object with two methods, turn() and toString(), and pass it to the animateworld function in the animateworld.js.
It is not necessary to complete the exercises at the end of the chapter.
Remember to use the Research-Ask method if you get stuck.
